isis.stitle: STEERABLE DRIVE AXLE END UNIT: FABCO - CLEAN AND INSPECT

step1.para: Steam may be used for external cleaning of completely assembled units. Care must be taken to ensure that water is kept out of the assembly by tightly closing breather caps and other openings.

Rough parts such as housings, which are too large to conveniently clean with solvents, may be immersed in a hot solution tank containing a mild alkaline solution. Parts cleaned in hot solution tanks must be rinsed thoroughly to prevent damage by traces of alkaline material.

Parts with ground or polished surfaces, such as bearings or shafts, should be cleaned with emulsion cleaners or petroleum solvents. Alkaline hot solution tanks may damage the machined surfaces and should be avoided.
